name: GrandeLASH™ Peptide Lash Enhancing Serum
about: What it is:A cult-favorite lash-enhancing serum that promotes the appearance of longer, thicker-looking lashes in as little as eight weeks..Highlighted Ingredients:- Amino Acids (L-Proline): An amino acid for healthy fortified lashes..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Infused with vitamins, peptides, and amino acids, this serum is a favorite for helping to visibly enhance short, thinning, or brittle lashes..Clinical Results:Based on a 16-week consumer study with 30 subjects (Results will vary):
ingredients: -Amino Acids (L-Proline): An amino acid for healthy fortified lashes..-Hyaluronic Acid (Sodium Hyaluronate).-Vitamin E (Tocopheryl Acetate)..Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Panthenol, Sodium Citrate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Propylene Glycol, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Gluconolactone, Sodium Benzoate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Polysorbate 20, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Arctostaphylos Uva Ursi Leaf Extract, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Sodium Metabisulfite, Phenoxyethanol, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Yeast Extract (Mel, Extrait de Miel), Sodium Lactate, Sodium PCA, Sorbitol, Proline, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexyglycerin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Triethanolamine, Dextran, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17, Benzoic Acid, Biotinoyl Tripeptide-1.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply GrandeLASH™ using a single stroke on your eyelid just above your upper lash line (like a liquid eyeliner)..-Use once daily and allow 1-2 minutes for the serum to dry...Tips:.-Remember, you’re applying to the skin closest to the lashes (the lash root), not the actual lashes..-You don’t need multiple applications or double dips. Using more than instructed will not yield quicker results. One dip into the bottle is enough for both eyes..-Due to the length of the lash cycle, apply every day for a full three months..-After desired improvement is achieved, apply every other day for maintenance. GrandeLASH™ requires continued use to maintain benefits...Precautions:.-Do not get into the eyes; in the event of direct contact, rinse with cool water. .-If you are under a physician’s care for an eye condition, are prone to dry eyes or are pregnant or nursing, consult your physician before use. .-Stop use if redness or irritation occurs. .-Keep out of reach of children. For more information, read box insert.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely DO NOT RECOMMEND!  I was excited to try this. My lashes were damaged from having false lashes. I used it for about a week, when I woke up one morning to my right eye being so bloodshot and sore. I haven’t changed anything in my nighttime routine except for using this serum. I will never use again. I am waiting to see my optometrist as my doctor believes I have a chemical burn on my eye.  Please use something else…. There are tons of reviews of ppl having this kind of issue. I believed I wouldn’t be one of them. Save yourself the issues

reviews.review_title: Jamaican black castor oil cold pressed!! Trustttt
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don’t waste your money! You can get the same results using Jamaican black castor oil! I bought this tube and I used it for a few months and it grew them but not as much as they’ve grown since using Jamaican black castor oil ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using Grande Lash Serum every night before bed, and I’ve seen incredible results! After sticking to it daily, I’ve noticed a significant difference in the length and fullness of my lashes. Before trying this serum, I used other brands, but none of them worked as effectively as this one. Consistency is key, so make sure to use it every day for the best results. I’ve attached some photos to show the difference in 2 months—it really works :) !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in my holiday set and it was dried out.  No product..sucks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I first purchased the mini grande lash serum in early may. After it lasted me a couple of weeks, I immediately bought the larger one. Yes, it’s expensive but definitely Yes, this product is expensive, but it’s definitely worth the money. I bought the mini around april or early May and then when I finished it in a couple of weeks, I immediately went back to Sephora to purchase the bigger one. My lashes are much longer and look amazing with mascara! I often get compliments about how long they are. In the first photo were my lashes before using the serum, and after almost 5 months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lash savior ! It enhances your lashes to build everyday confidence. This serum is amazing and truly works ! It improves the lashes and brows and makes them look full and long . Perfect for people who are suffering from eyebrows that don’t grow anymore and people with short lashes .

reviews.review_title: Canadian one sucks. American one is amazing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Canadian one: GrandeLash Peptide Lash Enhancing Serum does absolutely nothing. American one: GrandeLash MD lash enhancing serum works AMAZINGLY well. Takes about a month to notice results but the tube lasts 4/5 months. Lashes are super long, more curled, and went from blonde to having some colour, which I appreciate. DO NOT waste your money on the one available in Canada.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: 6 semaines d'utilisation et aucun changements. Dernier fois que j'achète se produit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I actually got this in my FFF box for a good deal so decided to try it out but not really expecting much. Using this everyday for the last 4 months my lashes have grown substantially. I've even had people ask if I had a lash lift done as I now don't usually wear mascara. This is pretty pricey but definitely makes a difference!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use Eyenvy before it got discontinued, and I’ve been on the hunt for something comparable ever since. This is NOT Eyenvy quality nor are the results nearly as good, but I do have to say it has been working decently well and hasn’t caused me any irritation so far and I’ve been using it for about a month now. This is probably the only serum that has done anything for me since the discontinuation of my last all time favourite, and I’ve tried many!!  I do agree that this is far too expensive for the quality of the product, but it has been working.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: OMG. Made my lashes MUCH longer and I don’t think it causes any pink eye or like swelling for me personally. My one issue is that I’m worried if I stop re-purchasing it my lashes will go back to its normal size which for me is kind of a bummer since it’s such an expensive repurchase. ￼

I usually think these kind of products are scams and don’t actually work. I got this serum as a sample and I’ve been using it every night for the past two weeks and IT WORKS! I already see a difference. My lashes are definitely longer and have more volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using it a few times per week since December. Totally works if you’re not sensitive to it. It tingles a bit but I haven’t had any other issues. Lashes are freakishly long.
Not made for sensitive skin, it gave me an allergic reaction

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I started growing little tiny hairs all over my eyelid. My eyelashes look great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been a strong supporter of this serum for a long time, it really does make a difference with the thickness and length of your lashes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using it for 3 months now I see amazing results..it was a little sensitive at first but it's okay now. I had very short lashes and the difference is huge. I got it after getting a sample with the reward. I always had sensitive eyes but no problems so far. I will always repurchase this product the only complaint I have is the price. It's kind of ridiculous 🤷🏼‍♀️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a tube of this in the Look Fantastic beauty advert calendar and have used it every other night since mid-December. I noticed my lash line filled in and my lashes were longer and thicker. Not sure I’d spend almost $100 on a tube by itself. I’ll see how long the results last once I’m done the tube…

reviews.review_title: Not for sensitive skin or eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It comes down to your own skin type but my eyelids became swollen, tender and small pimples popped up across my lash line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works for me. It is somewhat effective and definitely works best with other Grande Cosmetic products like the conditioner and enhancing mascaras.  I personally did not experience any reactions to their line of products but if you're worried, try to get a free sample or travel size kit to test them all out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: made my eyelids red and flaky, very irritated. I'm not usually sensitive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Every time I use this I wake up with sore and red eyes.  I’m not sure if it has done anything for my lashes at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this so much but I think it is overly priced. I recommend this product but I am sure there are dupes out there that are much cheaper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this lash serum as a sample and, like many other reviewers, I had a reaction on my eyelids after only using it twice. My eyelids near my lash line turned red and were a little swollen. Not good for your eyes, they should really stop selling this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly cannot get over this product, although I was super skeptical about this doing anything g after having tried multiple different lash serums that didn’t work I was pleasantly surprised. It took a couple weeks to notice a different but it was very evident once it started working. I had a complete bald spot on the inner corner of one of my eyes from ripping them out (accidentall) which sucked and I was super insecure about it. That’s when I decided to give this product a chance. After a couple weeks my lashes fully grew back in where they had been ripped out. I only have two downsides to this product one of which isn’t even really a downside but in this circumstance despite it growing back my missing eyelashes, it grew the adjacent lashes exponentially and made them visibly longer than the ones that were growing back (this really only showed its effectiveness tbh). But the real downside I have with this product it that as someone with sensitive skin my lashline does become a bit red and irritated causing the skin to peel off occasionally. If not for that this would’ve been a five-star product, but also not everyone will experience this issue. With that being said I cannot recommend this product enough seriously I tell everyone to just try it out for a couple weeks because it helped me so so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My lashes definitely got thicker and there was some length but nothing noticeable. Used for a year till it ran out. I also noticed it made me get dark circles around my eyes, definitely will look for an alternative.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: after reading the reviews i wasn’t sure if i should buy this serum but im glad i did! it has honestly helped my lashes grow and become fuller and it’s only been 3 weeks. so far, despite other reviews i havent had an allergic reaction to it

Je l’utilise depuis déjà environ décembre et oui mes cils sont plus long et puis foncé MAIS mes cils était gonflé. Sincèrement je crois arrêter de le porter si je dois endurer les enflures tout les 3 semaines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loveddd this product! I DONT recommend for people who have sensitive skin! Worked well for me - used every night for 5 months straight and bought a refill, I see amazing growth (added before & after pics!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this product grew my lashes so much so many people noticed how much my lashes grew and I got so many compliments. I didn’t get any side effects everything was perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: irritated my eyelid!! after a few days of using this product, my eyelid became swollen and red and started flaking. i don’t have sensitive skin or eyelids so this is unusual for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It stings and now after one use my eyelid is swollen and red. My eye is really watery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product, been using it for 3 weeks now and am throughly impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used my reward points to get a sample of this and I can’t tell whether it works or not because every time I use it my eyes sting and tear up.

reviews.review_title: it works but at a cost...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product worked when I first tried it and saw results within the first week but it has an irritating ingredient when put close to the eyes so it can damage your eyes and skin in general.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It itches and burns. I’ve only been using this product for one week. The gold of the bottle is already flaking off. It’s incredibly cheaply done

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: after 1 use my eyes burned! not happy with this at all, This just can't be safe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After a couple hours of using this product, my eyelashes began to itch and my eye turned bright red.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe this is a little stupid, but I expected something more luxurious from Ariana grande. Simple boring packaging, and yeah… it does burn your eyes for unknown reasons. Wish that I read the reviews because the last thing I need is to actually lose lashes yikes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product free by using points. After two nights of using it, my eyelids have chemical burns and my eyes are still red and watery from using it last night. Wouldn't recommend using points on this, and definitely don't recommend buying this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I lost lashes from this from only one day of using it. This is your sign to NOT buy this! I wasted 100 points on it.

reviews.review_title: gave me a chemical burn on my eyelid
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: WARNING: gave me a chemical burn on my eyelid. do not buy this serum.
Got this in a sample pack and it burned my eyes upon application. I woke up the next morning with a rashy lash line and very red & crusty eyes. Do not recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Product wasn’t great. After the first few days of using it, my eyes were burning. I do not recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Woke up with red swollen eyes and a red ring around them. Must be an allergic reaction or my skin is too sensitive. Hurts day after very sensitive to touch

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My lashes grew but as soon as I stopped, it went back to normal. Is also expensive.

reviews.review_title: Not for my sensitive skin girlies
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wish I read the reviews before trying this product… after *ONE* use my eye was very irritated and my eye lid is so sore and red. Those with sensitive skin. B E W A R E !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the grande md lash serum as a promo and now I know why it wad free. it darkened my eyelids around my lashline and gave me bad eczema around my eyes thats been irritated ever since and won't go away. skin is so delicate there already and now I fear it's thinned out more because of this product. don't trust any of grande cosmetics for your eyes. and shame on the company to have even given them out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My eyelashes felt very strong and healthy but it didn’t make them thicker or longer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Used the entire container as directed. Did not make any difference to my lashes. Was not impressed and will not buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and was able to try it for about 2 weeks. This worked incredibly and my lashes got so long! I usually have uneven lashes on my right eye, always have. This FIXED THAT. I was shocked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately FDA Canada banned the old formula that had prostaglandin analog that’s what made your lashes grow. The new formula is the same ingredients as the Ordinary lash serum save your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a fabulous serum ! I am thoroughly impressed with the quality of this lash serum. I have struggled with my lashes for a while and this serum majorly helped me get my long lashes back! Love love love

reviews.review_title: Finished it in what Felt like a Few days!?!?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I gave them 2 stars because i KNOW this works IF you are consistent with its use ...meaning using every morning every night, After about a mth your lashes start to become noticeably longer. By 2-3 mths they look great. So my 2 stars isnt about use, its about packaging. $47 for 1/10th of an ounce is crazy.  I ended up buying 2 from their website directly since it was constantly sold out on here...and there was a two-fer sale.  I used the first for a few weeks and it was done, the second a few weeks later. Conceptually i get the concept of 1/10, but when you finish the product in what feels like days after you opened it and you spent 50$ on it.....something just doenst feel right.  I cant blow my money like that..for that cost someone should come to my house to lay my falsies....sorry Grandlash

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so sad they reformulated this. It used to work really well, but now it doesn’t work. Save your money, beauties.

reviews.review_title: They must have changed the formula
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this a few years (2ml tube for 89$) ago and it made my lashes grow so long they would touch underneath my brow. Now it's 3ml for the same price and my lashes haven't grown that much even after 2nmonths of use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lash serum has saved my lashes! It promotes the appearance of naturally longer and thicker lashes. I wear contacts and have never had any issues! I am a avid lash extension queen so when I take a rest from my lashes, I always have grande lash waiting for me to help strengthen my lashes to their normal state.extensions,  used

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried a few lash serums because I started getting thinning lashes with menopause. Grand Lash is the bomb. After 3 months of daily use, I’ve noticed a big change…I can actually see my lashes again. Theybecome longer and

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After a lash lift treatment, unfortunately lashes started to fall. So I have been using the GrandeLASH Serum a little over a month. It helped my lash growth and length noticeably. I wish the price is a bit more affordable!

reviews.review_title: Warning - not suitable for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this because of how many people talked about it and because it blew up on TikTok - had high hopes but ended up very disappointed. Unfortunately, after one use I had an allergic reaction that just kept getting worse throughout the day. Woke up with bloodshot eyes and swelling in my left eye that got worse as the day progressed and by the end of the day both of my eyes were so irritated and it looked like I was wearing red eyeliner all around…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried at least 4-5 different lash growth serums and none have done the trick like this one. This is my fifth repurchase because it does as promised. I wouldn't review if this is untrue. I have brittle lashes and a lash extension girlie too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish that I didn’t love this product because it’s pricey. I purchased during the last Sephora sale as the full size was 50% off. I used it consistently all of December and since have been using it maybe every other night. I have never gotten more compliments on how LONG and thick my lashes are!!! I used to wear falsies all the time and now I barely do because I love how my lashes look with mascara. This product is amazing!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the sample and realized that the wand with bristles was hard as a rock. I applied it to my eyelashes regardless but felt no product. Did the same on my hand to test, same results. Glad I didn’t spend money on it but so disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worked very well for me but I’ve seen negative side effects for many others. Loved my results but won’t be repurchasing because I’m scared it will have a negative effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: definitely seen lash growth! However i also seen my eyes being irritated ￼after using for awhile i’d just be careful with this one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After three months of consistent use, the difference is barely there for me. I’d say skip it and go for something more reputable if you’re looking for a dramatic change. Disappointed. The first picture was the end of December, the second is the end of March (today)
